name: Sawmace (Trick Weapon)
entries: This heavy {@item mace|PHB} and {@item shield|PHB} are built to slot together. In mace form it deals {@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage as a one-handed weapon with shield, while in saw form it deals {@dice 1d12} slashing damage as a two-handed weapon. When a creature deals maximum damage on the {@dice d12} damage die in saw form, they can use their reaction to rev the sawblade, dealing an additional {@dice 1d12} slashing damage.

entries.name: Mace Form
entries: Functions as both a {@item mace|PHB} ({@dice 1d6} bludgeoning damage) and {@item shield|PHB} when wielded together, granting a +1 bonus to AC.

entries.name: Saw Form
entries: When you roll maximum damage on the {@dice d12} slashing damage die, you can use your reaction to rev the sawblade, dealing an additional {@dice 1d12} slashing damage.
